```{r}
library(fivethirtyeight)
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}

data("congress_age")

  old <- congress_age %>%
  mutate(year = format(termstart, "%Y")) %>%
  filter(party %in% c("R", "D")) %>%
  group_by(year, party) %>%
  summarize(avg = mean(age)) 
  
  ggplot(old, aes(x = year, y = avg, group = party, color = party, )) + 
    geom_line() +
    labs(title = "oldz") + 
    expand_limits(y = 40)
    


  
  
```
